greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Product_{k>=1} sinc(2Pi/(2k+1)).
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Sinc Function
formula: Pi/(2K), where K is given by A051762.
mathematica: digits = 102; $MaxExtraPrecision = 100; exactEnd = 100; seriesOrder = 60; f[n_] := Log[Sinc[2Pi/(2n + 1)]]; exactSum = Sum[f[n], {n, 1, exactEnd}]; se = Series[f[n], {n, Infinity, seriesOrder}] // Normal; extraSum = Sum[se, {n, exactEnd + 1, Infinity}]; RealDigits[Exp[exactSum + extraSum ], 10, digits] // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 07 2013 *)
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Apr 18 2006
ext: Last digit corrected by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 16 2015
